name: My Example Source
subtitle: All my apps in one place.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: EeveeSpotify
apps.subtitle: Your favorite music player.
apps.localizedDescription: Stream and enjoy your favorite music with EeveeSpotify, exclusively on AltStore.

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: App uses microphone for voice controls.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: App connects to local devices for music sharing.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: App uses Bluetooth to connect to speakers.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: App accesses your contacts for sharing music.
privacy.NSHomeKitUsageDescription: App uses HomeKit for device integration.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: App uses location to enhance your experience.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses camera for profile customization.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App accesses your photos for album art customization.
